meanings.definition: The width of a hand, typically about four inches.
meanings.sent1: She measured the bookshelf using a handsbreadth to see if it would fit.
meanings.sent2: He estimated the distance to be a handsbreadth away.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten tried to jump a handsbreadth but fell short.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as narrow as a handsbreadth when waiting in line.
meanings.sent5: The handsbreadth of the river made it easy to cross.

meanings.definition: A small unit of measurement equal to the width of a hand.
meanings.sent1: The tailor used a handsbreadth to ensure the perfect fit of the dress.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter marked the wood with a handsbreadth before cutting.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a handsbreadth of salt to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was only a handsbreadth compared to his wealth.
meanings.sent5: The handsbreadth of fabric was just enough to complete the project.
